# Astelfa

Add magic to the world.

Mod in early development and not ready for use in the game.

## Features

- [x] New mobs
- [x] New items
- [x] New crafting stations
- [x] New decorative blocks
- [x] New enchantments
- [x] New curses
- [ ] New bosses
- [ ] New world generation
- [ ] New equipment
